title: Kneeling Figure of St. Bruno
medium: black chalk heightened with white on tan paper
credit_line: Gift of Dr. and Mrs. Daniel Fishkoff
provenance_text:
Jean Restout the Younger [1692-1768], Paris, France. Museo Nacional De Bellas Artes, Santiago,Chile. Seiferheld-Selz Fine Arts Inc., New York, NY [1]. Dr. and Mrs. Daniel Fishkoff, Colonia, NJ, by June 12, 1974 [2]; their gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1975.

Notes:
[1]. Several other works in the Fishkoff collection have also passed through the Seiferheld gallery in NYC, which was active throughout the 1960s under various names.
[2]. Daniel and Jane Fishkoff loaned the work to the Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute in June 1974; see curatorial file for original loan form and list of works.

creator.birth_place: Rouen (Département de la Seine-Maritime, Haute-Normandie, France)
creator.death_place: Paris (Ville de Paris department, Île-de-France, France)
